page.title: 19Clubs in South Benfleet.
page.content: The W.I.,the Townswomen's Guild and the W.R.V.S. cater specially for the women.Young people can find suitable activities clubs attched to the Methodist and Baptist and St.Mary's Church. Sport is cater for by clubs engaged in cricket,football,bowling, badminton,golf, tennis,riding and yachting.Other clubs cover the pastimes of photography, gardening, Morris dancing,ballet and old time dancing.The Benfleet Arts and Crafts Club,the Dramatic Society and the Concert Orchestra cater for the Arts. The W.E.A.,and the Evening Institutes at Appleton and King John School cover for a wide variety of interests. Benfleet and District Historical Society is very active.Contact is kept up with Germany and France through the Twinning Associations with Cologne/ Lovenich and Paris/Romainville.
